description:
When an unexpected phenomenon stops time, Kite is able to gain the upper hand by tapping into Astral`s memories and witnessing firsthand the battles that he and Yuma have fought together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Time Has Come, The Three Suns Appear
Toki no Otozure, Arawareshi 3-tsu no Taiyou
時の訪れ 現われし3つの太陽
